channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This was a money grab’: My uncle took over the family business when my grandfather died — and left my father out in the cold. What now?
item.description: “When my grandfather passed away, my uncle continued running the business and, at that point, he decided that my father would not receive any financia...

item.title: Changing Jobs Can Put a $300,000 Dent in Retirement Savings
item.description: Workers who change jobs tend to reset their 401(k) accounts at a lower savings rate without realizing it. The drag can last years into the future.

item.title: ‘I’m scared to death’: My wife asked for a divorce after 21 years. She wants to buy a house with our savings, but promises to help pay my mortgage.
item.description: “There is more than enough money in the savings to completely pay off the current mortgage.”

item.title: Carrying a Credit-Card Balance Has Gotten Way More Expensive
item.description: Issuers are raising rates in anticipation of an $8 cap on late fees that is tied up in court.

item.title: China’s rally still has ‘more legs,’ Goldman Sachs says
item.description: The recent two-week rally sparked by the unveiling of the People’s Bank of China’s stimulus package has already seen one of the sharpest increases in ...

item.title: Stock Futures Weaken as New Week Gets Under Way
item.description: U.S. index futures ticked lower with the focus returning to corporate earnings, as the week brings quarterly results from some of the biggest names in...

item.title: ‘Their house was purchased with my family money’: My late father left a life estate to his second wife. She’s only 10 years older than me. How can I undo this?
item.description: “Apparently the probate laws in Florida are different, perhaps superseding the will.”

item.title: Old Drug Repurposed for Schizophrenia Could Reap Alzheimer's Windfall
item.description: Bristol-Myers’ newly approved schizophrenia treatment might be coming full circle.

item.title: Geopolitics Still a Key Factor for Oil Markets
item.description: Phillip Nova said there appears to be profit-taking after oil prices surged last week and markets will likely experience a boost on concerns about an ...

item.title: The strong jobs report leads Morgan Stanley to ditch a stock-market call it made just two weeks ago
item.description: Markets were having a bit of a breather Monday morning after the big rally following the much better than expected jobs report.
